R tip - This is how to read and bind data from many excel files:

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)

files_list <- list.files(path = ".",
                         pattern = "^plan(.)*.xlsx",
                         full.names = TRUE)

df <- 
  files_list %>% 
  map(read_excel) %>% 
  reduce(bind_rows)
```
